# Public Assets Directory

This directory contains static assets that are served directly by Vite.

## Logo

Place your ActiveLink Finland logo file here as `logo.png`.

The logo should be:
- Format: PNG, JPG, or SVG
- Recommended size: At least 200px wide for best quality
- The logo will be automatically resized to fit the navigation

The logo path is configured in `Layout.jsx` and will be served from `/logo.png`.
